programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 Look Away
programme.desc: A fight involving female detainees breaks out after one woman accuses the other of staring at her. A man is arrested for shattering the hotel glass door as a result of a fight. An old crooner believes that rap stars are going to bail him out of jail. Handcuffs don’t stop a woman from trying to flirt with an officer.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E21 Mad About Everybody
programme.desc: An inmate's flirting calms a jailhouse fight. An inebriated man tries to avoid his eighth DUI by claiming his car was stolen, and a disagreement over Faecbook puts a couple in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E39 Occupied By Psoriasis
programme.desc: An intoxicated man claims to be connected to the occupy Wall Street movement. Officers struggle with a combative man, and a tearful candy thief is taken into custody.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E43 Pot For Poker
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims he's selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 LV NYE
programme.desc: We follow the men and women of LVMPD as they do their best to tame the New Year's Eve festivities up and down the Las Vegas Strip.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Bad Trip
programme.desc: Officers fear a man may attempt to hang himself and decide to intervene. A heavily injured man ends up in jail after taking cocaine and acid. Irascibility shadows a man with low blood sugar.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Bad Luck Hooker
programme.desc: A man brought in for trespassing becomes violent. A sex worker admits she۪s witholding her pediculosis condition from clients. A woman explains her tattoos are a reminder of the women she loved.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Humility & Tranquility
programme.desc: Cousins come to jail together but only one leaves. Officers contend the best they can with an unruly inmate. Naked meditation in a parking lot lands a street artist in jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Old Habits Die Hard
programme.desc: An inmate demands that officers follow her instructions while in jail. A man insists that he has been kidnapped by the police and is being held illegally. An elderly man discovers that domestic violence does not have an age limit. A young woman makes the hard decision to turn herself in to change her life around.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Meth Rage
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E33 Little Big Man
programme.desc: A dominatrix is arrested for playing rough. A father is accused of assaulting his daughter's boyfriend, and an inmate's negative attitude leads to trouble.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Drunken Corvette
programme.desc: After totaling his Corvette, a man is arrested for drunk driving. Complex personality issues are unveiled while an inmate is interrogated. A man is placed in a mask after spraying saliva far and wide.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Mommy Issues
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT an inebriated man gets aggressive and questions why he's in custody. In Sarasota, FL a couple are taken in for assaulting a bartender. In Portland, OR a man is placed in custody for harassing movie theater security guards. In Las Vegas, NV a chauffeur is placed in custody for amassing a number of of moving violations.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E36 Landlord Attack
programme.desc: An inmate swallows a stash of drugs and then comes down with a case of the munchies. A 72-year-old offers an unusual excuse for dealing drugs to teens at a mall, and a woman charged with assaulting a landlord fakes being sick to get out of jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Homeless Hospitality
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV an intoxicated man is strapped to a restraining chair. In Portland, OR a seemingly gracious man is arrested for assault. In Spokane, WA a homeless man is brought in for assault. In Salt Lake City, UT a frequent visitor is brought in for threating the security staff at a local bar with a firearm.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 DUI Death
programme.desc: An inmate fails to impress the staff with his witticisms. A woman boasts about excelling at her DUI field test, and a man learns his wreckless driving has resulted in the death of a man.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Ultimate Fighter
programme.desc: An angry inmate refuses to change clothes. A man in violation of his parole is stopped by officers for attempting to hitchhike. Two men claim they were beaten by their girlfriends.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Caught On Camera
programme.desc: Two men are found fighting on security cameras. Meanwhile, an impromptu tattoo jail parlor is discovered and shut down. Later, a Russian man and his mysterious friend are excited to be in a U.S. jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Hopeless Hooker
programme.desc: An uncooperative woman is placed in a restraint chair. A troubled woman with a drug addiction is brought in on prostitution charges. One man is taken to a sobering cell to sleep off his intoxication.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Fight For Your Right
programme.desc: A woman is placed into a restraint chair during intake. Punches are thrown and questions are asked after a fight occurs. After dodging a bar tab, a woman is also accused of spiting and biting.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Pregnant Hooker
programme.desc: A strip search reveals a male inmate in women's lingerie. A couple of puppy thieves get amorous in the bathroom, and a pregnant woman is arrested for solicitation.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 Angry Probation
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Meth Rage
programme.desc: Officers conduct a strip search after an inmate is accused of carrying contraband. A repeat offender dances for deputies and fellow inmates. High on meth, a man acts erratically during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 In the same League
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Family Man
programme.desc: In his holding cell, a man fights officers after taking Xanax. An officer discovers a suspect may be facing criminal charges for his son. K-9 units are needed during a search for improvised weapons.

programme.desc: A cavalcade of clothing calamities & 'interesting choices' from superstars including Bowie, Madonna, Adam Ant, Bananarama, Queen, Wham, Five Star & maybe even Limahl himself!

programme.title: WOW! What A Party!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 WOW! What A Party!
programme.desc: A non-stop ticket to the ultimate retro rave! We crank up the neon and hit the dancefloor with the most electrifying feelgood music videos the 80s had to offer.

programme.title: Fashion Overload! 1980-1989
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Fashion Overload! 1980-1989
programme.desc: From shoulder pads & chunky pullovers to dodgy beards, suspect eyeshadow & hoop earrings - the 80s were a juggernaut of excess! Here are 40 videos which defined the era.

programme.title: Gone...But Not Forgotten Top 30
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Gone...But Not Forgotten Top 30
programme.desc: They're no longer with us, but their music lives on forever. Superstars like Tina, Aretha, Whitney, Freddie, Bowie & Prince rub shoulders with other cool performers in our tribute.

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: Cuddle On The Couch - The Love 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cuddle On The Couch - The Love 50
programme.desc: 4 hours of 80s love. What more could you ask for a long smooch on the sofa?

programme.title: Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Soft Rock & Power Pop!
programme.desc: From the decade that invented the genre - non-stop powerful love songs, back to back.

programme.title: No.1 Power Ballads of the 80s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 No.1 Power Ballads of the 80s
programme.desc: Superstar hits with powerful vocals - with Whitney, Jennifer Rush, Ben E King & Bonnie Tyler. All of them reached number 1 in the UK.

programme.title: Gone...But Not Forgotten Top 30

programme.desc: They're no longer with us, but their music lives on forever. Superstars like Tina, Aretha, Whitney, Freddie, Bowie & Prince rub shoulders with other cool performers in our tribute.

programme.title: Depeche Mode: 1981-1989
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Depeche Mode: 1981-1989
programme.desc: From 1981's early hits through to 1989's classic 'Violator' album - here's a slice of anthemic Depeche Mode - in order.

programme.title: Elton John in the 80s!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Elton John in the 80s!
programme.desc: All 9 of the Elton's top 10 hits from the 80s! Including Nikita, Passengers, Kiss The Bride & the live version of Candle in the Wind.

programme.title: Magic Moments! The 80s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Magic Moments! The 80s
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made the 80s!

programme.title: Simple Minds v Deacon Blue
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simple Minds v Deacon Blue
programme.desc: Battle of the Glasgow 80s supergroups as Simple Minds go up against Deacon Blue!

programme.title: Lionel Richie: 1981-1986
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Lionel Richie: 1981-1986
programme.desc: 10 songs from one of the decade's biggest stars - in order! From his solo debut with Diana Ross in 1981 to Ballerina Girl in 1986.

programme.title: Karaoke For Your Kids! Top 25
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Karaoke For Your Kids! Top 25
programme.desc: Singalong hits with the ultimate in dead catchy choruses. From Mickey & Tarzan Boy to Walk The Dinosaur & House of Fun.

programme.title: Start Your Party With A Fizz!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Start Your Party With A Fizz!
programme.desc: Bucks Fizz founder members Cheryl, Mike & Jay are back as 'The Fizz', and these guys still know how to start an 80s party! It's time for a celebration!

programme.title: We're Feelin' 80s All Over!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 We're Feelin' 80s All Over!
programme.desc: All 80s - 24/7 - the feelgood pop decade where the Brits invaded the world!

programme.title: Dirty Dancing! Top 60
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dirty Dancing! Top 60
programme.desc: Trying to impress someone with your cool moves? You could try these! 60 music videos from the 80s with some great, but also some very suspect dance moves and routines!

programme.title: 1988 Unleashed!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 1988 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Dramatic storylines, big dance routines, neon lights & iconic fashions - these are the classic music videos that made 1988!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1988
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW Yearbook 1988
programme.desc: Another top year, with rock, reggae, pop & power ballads rubbing shoulders with exciting new dance sounds from the US & Europe. Bruno Brookes has the story - month by month.

programme.title: Trev & Simon's Swing Your Pants!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Trev & Simon's Swing Your Pants!
programme.desc: 80s TV funny men Trev & Simon are the perfect hosts to get you in the mood to party, swing some pants, and have a giggle about some of the top pop talent of the decade!

programme.title: Derek Griffiths: Playschool Disco!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Derek Griffiths: Playschool Disco!
programme.desc: The voice of your childhood Derek Griffiths with 40 of those tunes you pestered your parents to buy - all top pop moments that still bring a smile & happy memories of school days!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Baking the Holidays

programme.title: Fantastic Pastry Presents

programme.title: Bakes On A Budget
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Baking the Holidays

programme.title: Bakes Around The World
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Baking the Holidays
programme.desc: Join Mia on a trip around the world – without leaving the kitchen! With stops in Japan, Germany and Mexico.

programme.title: Hack Your Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Baking the Holidays
programme.desc: Mia shows you how to hack cakes and makeover treats from the grocery store. You won’t even turn on your oven

programme.title: But First, Brunch
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Bring your loved ones together over a celebratory brunch spread made with love.

programme.title: One Pot Meals
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 Struggle Meals
programme.desc: These delicious, mess-free one-pot meals mean minimal cleanup and maximum satisfaction.

programme.title: Struggle Splurge
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Treat yourself to dinner struggle style: easy enough for a weeknight yet as elegant as a restaurant special.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below

programme.title: Magical Mcway Cove

programme.title: Northland Beaches: New Zealand
programme.desc: Traversing the Northland region's pristine beaches that showcase the diverse natural beauty of New Zealand's coastline, and basking in the unspoiled scenery of sandy shores, clear waters, and stunning natural landscapes.

programme.title: Purple Mountain Wildflowers

programme.title: Hemin Pealey: Îles de la Madeleine

programme.title: Healing Hawaii II: Oahu

programme.title: Hollyford Track: New Zealand
programme.desc: Take a stroll through a remote beech forest, full of diverse vegetation, waterfalls, and rocky streams.

programme.title: Return to Paradise 1

programme.title: Tiga Warna Beach: Indonesia

programme.title: The Soothing Sun

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 World Heritage Ancient Cities of Sri Lanka
programme.desc: The central plains of Sri Lanka are dotted with crumbling temples, lost cities and ruins of sacred Buddhist sites. It was here that ancient Sinhalese dynasties set up their capitals and supported massive artistic and architectural endeavors. Sigiriya, the ancient fortress atop a 66o-feet-high rock soaring out of a forest, and Polonnaruwa, the epitome of ancient Buddhist architecture, with its refined carvings, are but a few of the sites now ranking as national treasures.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E37 XP Guide Male
programme.desc: Malé, the bustling capital of the Maldives, is in stark contrast to the secluded luxury of the island resorts for which the archipelago is known.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Unwind Jumerriah Al-Qasr, Dubai
programme.desc: From the fragrances at the Perfume Souk to a hot air balloon ride in the desert, Sabrina gets a taste of heritage and luxury at Madinat Jumeirah.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Quest Karni Fort & Fort Begu, India
programme.desc: Alex visits Karni Fort and Fort Begu in Rajasthan, where she unearths some prized dishes of the nobilities.

programme.desc: Catch the beauty of Prague through its fascinating history, its classic mix of Gothic and Renaissance architecture and more.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Quest Fort Begu 1, India
programme.desc: Hungry for stories and flavours of a bygone kingdom, Alex meets Rana Sawai Harisingh II, the 24th descendant to the royal family of Begu.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bliss Santorini, Greece
programme.desc: Most popular destinations of Santorini's main island are the volcano and the hot spring.This is best way to explore this island is on foot.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan
programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Unwind Park Hyatt, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya Passfield seeks local Maldivian experiences in Hadahaa, where she learns about the ecosystem, local traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta and Jog Jakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson visits the Borobudur temple and explores the local art and nightlife scenes in Jogjakarta.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Costa Rica Calling, Turrialba
programme.desc: In the Turrialba region, Genevieve finds herself in awe of the highest volcano in Costa Rica, its active presence quickening her pulse.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Quest Kolkata 2, India
programme.desc: Bengal has not only been home to the former capital of British India but also been the land where many European colonies vied for dominance and cultural supremacy. As a result, the cuisine of the land underwent a renaissance, wherein it imbibed many European influences including Portuguese, Dutch and Danish. Alex visits what used to be a Danish settlement on the banks of the river Hooghly, and she unearths recipes, which were born from this delicious amalgamation of cultures.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 1, Ireland
programme.desc: Starting his journey of Wild Atlantic Way, Alex stops at Cliffs of Moher. He further visits Ashford Castle, ending as he cycles 60 kms to Mulranny.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Costa Rica Calling, Turrialba
programme.desc: In the Turrialba region, Genevieve finds herself in awe of the highest volcano in Costa Rica, its active presence quickening her pulse.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 City Breaks Dubai
programme.desc: On a trip to Dubai, Sabrina discovers the city’s penchant for bizarre theme parks at the world’s first Bollywood theme park. On the one hand, she is intrigued to find attractions such as the world’s largest man-made marina and a snow wonderland in this desert city. On the other hand, the city’s souks and a traditional Bedouin camp in a desert introduce her to the Middle Eastern magic that inspired the thousand and one stories of Scheherzade.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo and Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson visits the youngest volcano on the ancient Tengger caldera, Mount Bromo. She also goes to see the Komodo dragons.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Costa Rica Calling Manuel Antonio
programme.desc: In the Manuel Antonio region of Costa Rica, Genevieve’s quest for wildlife leads her from rainforest to ocean.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Quest Kolkata 3, India
programme.desc: The pillowy goodness of Bengali sweets is even more famous in India than some of Kolkata’s landmarks. Alex, however, sets out to discover the forgotten sweets of Bengal. She meets some veteran sweet shop owners in the city, who show her how to make some lesser-known traditional sweets.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 2, Ireland
programme.desc: Alex explores Keem beach, visits Dooagh village and 6000 year old Ceide Fields. Next day, after breakfast, he explores Donegal.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Costa Rica Calling Manuel Antonio
programme.desc: In the Manuel Antonio region of Costa Rica, Genevieve’s quest for wildlife leads her from rainforest to ocean.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 City Breaks Salzburg, Austria
programme.desc: Encircled by the Alps and straddling the Salzach river, the mesmerizing city of Salzburg has a dramatic setting matched only by the Baroque splendour of its architecture. Sabrina Chakici loses herself in the old-world charm of its cobblestone streets, magnificent cathedrals, medieval fortress and stunning gardens. She also visits the home of Mozart, who was born and inspired endlessly in this cultural capital of Austria.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo and Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson explores the scenery, culture and flavours on the islands of Komodo National Park. She also visits the Taman Ayun temple in Bali.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Costa Rica Calling Corcovado
programme.desc: Guided by an irresistible call to adventure, young American traveler, Genevieve Sexton ventures deep into Costa Rica.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Quest Naila 1, India
programme.desc: Khad Maas is a celebrated Rajasthani dish with war-time origins. Game meat used to be slow-cooked in underground pits created to ensure that the fire could not be seen by enemy troops. Due to its intricate and cumbersome preparation, the dish seldom graces tables in Rajasthan today. Alex learns how to prepare this with the cultural conservationist, Trivikram.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 3, Ireland
programme.desc: Alex continues his journey on Wild Atlantic Way and is in Kinsale. Starting with a heritage walk and ending with exploring the Kinnegar Brewery.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Quest Naila 2, India
programme.desc: The sheer ingenuity and artistry of Rajasthani cuisine is an enduring testament to the skill and grim determination of the people who have made their homes in this largely arid land. Sigiriya, the ancient fortress atop a 66o-feet-high rock soaring out of a forest, and Polonnaruwa, the epitome of ancient Buddhist architecture, with its refined carvings, are but a few of the sites now ranking as national treasures.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Quest Fort Begu 1, India
programme.desc: Hungry for stories and flavours of a bygone kingdom, Alex meets Rana Sawai Harisingh II, the 24th descendant to the royal family of Begu.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 Xp Guide Prague, Czech Republic
programme.desc: Catch the beauty of Prague through its fascinating history, its classic mix of Gothic and Renaissance architecture and more.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Unwind Park Hyatt, Maldives
programme.desc: Indeya Passfield seeks local Maldivian experiences in Hadahaa, where she learns about the ecosystem, local traditions and cuisine.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 1, Ireland
programme.desc: Starting his journey of Wild Atlantic Way, Alex stops at Cliffs of Moher. He further visits Ashford Castle, ending as he cycles 60 kms to Mulranny.

programme.title: Unbound, Slovenia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unbound Bled, Slovenia
programme.desc: Bled is like something out of a dream

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Costa Rica Calling, Turrialba
programme.desc: In the Turrialba region, Genevieve finds herself in awe of the highest volcano in Costa Rica, its active presence quickening her pulse.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Quest Kolkata 2, India
programme.desc: Bengal has not only been home to the former capital of British India but also been the land where many European colonies vied for dominance and cultural supremacy. As a result, the cuisine of the land underwent a renaissance, wherein it imbibed many European influences including Portuguese, Dutch and Danish. Alex visits what used to be a Danish settlement on the banks of the river Hooghly, and she unearths recipes, which were born from this delicious amalgamation of cultures.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta and Jog Jakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson visits the Borobudur temple and explores the local art and nightlife scenes in Jogjakarta.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 City Breaks Dubai
programme.desc: On a trip to Dubai, Sabrina discovers the city’s penchant for bizarre theme parks at the world’s first Bollywood theme park. On the one hand, she is intrigued to find attractions such as the world’s largest man-made marina and a snow wonderland in this desert city. On the other hand, the city’s souks and a traditional Bedouin camp in a desert introduce her to the Middle Eastern magic that inspired the thousand and one stories of Scheherzade.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 2, Ireland
programme.desc: Alex explores Keem beach, visits Dooagh village and 6000 year old Ceide Fields. Next day, after breakfast, he explores Donegal.

programme.title: Unbound, Slovenia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Unbound Radovljica, Slovenia
programme.desc: Sabrina visits a quaint town with mountain views and medieval houses

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Costa Rica Calling Manuel Antonio
programme.desc: In the Manuel Antonio region of Costa Rica, Genevieve’s quest for wildlife leads her from rainforest to ocean.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Quest Kolkata 3, India
programme.desc: The pillowy goodness of Bengali sweets is even more famous in India than some of Kolkata’s landmarks. Alex, however, sets out to discover the forgotten sweets of Bengal. She meets some veteran sweet shop owners in the city, who show her how to make some lesser-known traditional sweets.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo and Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson visits the youngest volcano on the ancient Tengger caldera, Mount Bromo. She also goes to see the Komodo dragons.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 City Breaks Salzburg, Austria
programme.desc: Encircled by the Alps and straddling the Salzach river, the mesmerizing city of Salzburg has a dramatic setting matched only by the Baroque splendour of its architecture. Sabrina Chakici loses herself in the old-world charm of its cobblestone streets, magnificent cathedrals, medieval fortress and stunning gardens. She also visits the home of Mozart, who was born and inspired endlessly in this cultural capital of Austria.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Off The Grid Wild Atlantic Way 3, Ireland
programme.desc: Alex continues his journey on Wild Atlantic Way and is in Kinsale. Starting with a heritage walk and ending with exploring the Kinnegar Brewery.

programme.title: Unbound, Slovenia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Unbound Soca Valley, Slovenia
programme.desc: Slovenia’s Soca Valley, a land of aquamarine river rapids

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Costa Rica Calling Corcovado
programme.desc: Guided by an irresistible call to adventure, young American traveler, Genevieve Sexton ventures deep into Costa Rica.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Quest Naila 1, India
programme.desc: Khad Maas is a celebrated Rajasthani dish with war-time origins. Game meat used to be slow-cooked in underground pits created to ensure that the fire could not be seen by enemy troops. Due to its intricate and cumbersome preparation, the dish seldom graces tables in Rajasthan today. Alex learns how to prepare this with the cultural conservationist, Trivikram.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo and Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah Jackson explores the scenery, culture and flavours on the islands of Komodo National Park. She also visits the Taman Ayun temple in Bali.

programme.desc: An overwater villa with a clear glass floor, and an underwater spa treatment enhance Kim’s experience of the water wonderland that is Maldives.

programme.title: Quest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Quest Naila 2, India
programme.desc: The sheer ingenuity and artistry of Rajasthani cuisine is an enduring testament to the skill and grim determination of the people who have made their homes in this largely arid land. Alex finds out that this applies to the imperial cuisine of the state as well, when she meets Trivikram and learns from him how to prepare a traditional meat dish, that was made using meat leftovers.

programme.title: How chaos ultimately decided the final podium lineup - F1 British GP Review
programme.desc: The British Grand Prix didn’t disappoint, with a dream victory for Lando Norris, beating teammate Oscar Piastri after the Australian picked up a 10-second penalty for erratic driving behind the Safety Car. But the star of the show was Sauber’s Nico Hulkenberg, who after 15 years and 239 starts in Formula 1, finally got his first podium finish. Autosport Editor-In-Chief Kevin Turner sits down with Jake Boxall-Legge and Ronald Vording to discuss all the action and news from Silverstone. Including Hulk's "incredible" podium, whether Piastri should have been penalised, Max Verstappen's spin from second and the persistent rumours over his future, and Mohammed Ben Sulayem's challenger for...

programme.title: Volkswagen ID.R: Nordschleife Record
programme.desc: Go on a journey with Volkswagen as they aim to break the lap record on the Nordschleife circuit, go behind the scenes with interviews from Hans-Joachim Stuck and Romain Dumas

programme.title: F1 Rubber Stamps GM’s F1 Entry
programme.desc: So, after several years of preparations, negotiations, public arguments, and even the US Department of Justice getting involved, Cadillac has finally been formally announced as Formula 1’s 11th team for the 2026 season! Today’s formal announcement confirms the handshake agreement that the sport had with General Motors last November. After a revised bid led by Dan Towriss of the TWG Group (Formerly Andretti) was accepted. The Silverstone-based project now has the green light to prepare for its first race in just 12 months as a customer team with Ferrari power units until General Motors builds its own version for 2028. Motorsport.Com’s Editor in Chief, Ben Hunt, reacts to this breaking...

programme.title: The Valentino Rossi Story
programme.desc: An extraordinary personality, global popularity, legendary victory celebrations, and nine motorcycle world championship titles - those are the words to describe Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: Dakar 1986
programme.desc: All the action from the classic Dakar Rally in 1986, from Duke Video.

programme.title: Spa Classic 2024
programme.desc: Catch up on all the highlights from the 2024 Spa Classic.

programme.title: BRC 2025 - Round 4: Rallye De Wallonie
programme.desc: What a denouement. After Cédric Cherain dominated the race with the Porsche 992 Rally GT, the car suddenly stopped briefly on the Naninne dirt track due to an electronic fault. lost 2 minutes and Jos Verstappen did not miss the opportunity to score his third win of the season.

programme.title: F1's Fiercest Rivalries with Karun Chandhok
programme.desc: From the personal insults of Nigel Mansell vs Nelson Piquet, the short but fiery feud between Ayrton Senna and Michael Schumacher, to a friendship turned sour between Nico Rosberg and Lewis Hamilton, they’re all featured here. But what pair takes the Number 1 spot? Autosport Editor-In-Chief Kevin Turner sits down with former driver and Sky Sports F1 broadcaster Karun Chandhok to debate who they think are the Top 10 greatest rivalries in the sport’s 75-year history. Let us know who you think F1’s greatest rivalry was in the comments, and check back soon for a new series of F1 Top 10 Podcasts!

programme.title: Giorgio Piola: Illustrating Speed
programme.desc: For nearly 50 years Giorgio Piola has been the foremost technical journalist in Formula 1. He has attended more Grands Prix than anyone in history. This film looks at the remarkable career of this legend.

programme.title: Michael Schumacher at Le Mans
programme.desc: In 1991, before his stellar F1 career, Michael Schumacher raced for Mercedes at Le Mans - and had a legitimate shot at winning the most prestigious endurance race in the World. Autosport Editor-in-Chief Kevin Turner narrates the story of this dramatic race, and explains how the lessons Schumacher learnt in these 900bhp cars shaped his career in F1, and assisted him in some of his most famous races.

programme.title: W2RC 2024: Full Season Review
programme.desc: Let's look back at the 2024 season.

programme.title: The car so good it shocked Ferrari
programme.desc: Ferrari dominated the 2004 F1 season, crushing its underachieving opposition and wrapping up both world championships early. It achieved that with a car that was so good from the moment it hit the track, that the team was convinced it had done something wrong. In this video we tell the story of how Ferrari tried to get to the bottom of what had gone wrong with the build of the car, while drivers Michael Schumacher and Rubens Barrichello were convinced the pace was real.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Almería (ESP)

programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2023
programme.desc: Heute besuchen wir die wunderschöne Stadt Genf in der Schweiz für die European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023. Auf dem atemberaubenden "Lac Leman" zeigen einige der besten Windsurfer der Welt ihr Können in den Disziplinen Foilstyle und Tow-In. Schauen wir uns ein bisschen Wasser-Action an!

programme.title: Episode 27
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 27

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.sub-title: S01 : E45 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Airton Cozzolino
programme.desc: We joined Airton Cozzolino, the 2023 World Champion, at his home in Cape Verde to see what goes on behind the life of a champion, and what the pressure of starting the first competition of the year at home truly feels like.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: Alaska or Bus´t - MTB Roadtrip - Athlete Profile Andrew Taylor (USA)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2017
programme.desc: laska has always been a dream-riding destination for 28-year-old American mountain biker Andrew Taylor. But being over 3,000 miles away from his hometown Santa Cruz, it seemed a bit too far to just jump in the truck and go.

programme.title: 4634 Perception - The Mountain Within
programme.sub-title: S01 : E51 WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2017
programme.desc: Monte Rosa: the highest mountain range in Switzerland with the Dufourspitze, its highest peak, at 4,634m in altitude, is home to the longest mountain pass in the Alps: the Marinelli. It also harbours a dream... Géraldine Fasnacht’s dream.

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2018 - Womens Climbing Part 1 - Female Climbing Heroes -
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Challenge Roth 2025 - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Challenge Roth 2025 - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Challenge Roth 2025 - Live delayed Part 3
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Challenge Roth 2025 - Live delayed Part 4
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E11 Stage 11 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E12 Stage 12 - SCL Poland 2023
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E13 Stage 13 - SCL Cyprus 2023
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League

programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 GLORY 10 Los Angeles SFS
programme.desc: GLORY 10: Los Angeles on September 28, 2013 at the Citizens Business Bank Arena in Ontario, California. The highlight of the event featured a Glory Middleweight World Championship Tournament.[15] Two tournament matches were held, with a third match as reserve. The winners of the two semi-final bouts, proceeded to the finals for the championship main-event. The event also featured eight other non-tournament bouts.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 GLORY 10 Los Angeles
programme.desc: GLORY returns to the US with a four-man Middleweight Tournament to decide the GLORY Middleweight title. Plus two lightweight match ups with Robin van Roosmalen taking on Shemsi Beqiri and Davit Kiria meeting Murthel Groenhart.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 100 Last Heavyweight Standing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORY’s most popular fighters.

programme.desc: This event featured world title fight for the Glory Welterweight Championship between Nieky Holzken and Yoann Kongolo as headliner, and 4-Man Heavyweight Contender Tournament to earn a title shot for the Glory Heavyweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 GLORY 31 Amsterdam
programme.desc: GLORY returns to Europe as current lightweight champion Robin van Roosmalen puts his title on the line in a rematch against Sittichai Sitsongpeenong. Plus, a four-man welterweight tournament featuring Murthel Groenhart, Yoann Kongolo, Harut Grigorian, and Karim Benmansour.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 GLORY 33 SuperFight Series
programme.desc: The GLORY 33 SuperFight Series features a middleweight title fight between champion SImon Marcus and top ranked challenger Jason Wilnis. Plus a heavyweight battle between Chi Lewis Parry and Anthony McDonald.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 GLORY 33 New Jersey
programme.desc: The 'King of Kickboxing' Rico Verhoeven puts his heavyweight belt on the line as he faces off against Brazilian Anderson Silva. Also, a one night, four-man featherweight tournament featuring former champion Serhii Adamchuk.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY 36 SuperFight Series
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands' Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the can't miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY 36 Oberhausen
programme.desc: The Lightweight title is on the line as Sittichai looks to defend his title against #1 challenger Marat Grigorian. There is also a four-man lightweight tournament on the card.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY COLLISION
programme.desc: It's the fight everyone wants to see as GLORY Heavyweight champion, Rico Verhoeven takes on Badr Hari. Plus, the Welterweight title is on the line as Nieky Holzken meets Cedric Doumbé.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 GLORY 33 New Jersey
programme.desc: The 'King of Kickboxing' Rico Verhoeven puts his heavyweight belt on the line as he faces off against Brazilian Anderson Silva. Also, a one night, four-man featherweight tournament featuring former champion Serhii Adamchuk.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY 36 SuperFight Series
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands' Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the can't miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.desc: The Lightweight title is on the line as Sittichai looks to defend his title against #1 challenger Marat Grigorian. There is also a four-man lightweight tournament on the card.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Welterweight Wisniewski wants payback, after Jorge Masvidal used his training in underground, and barely legal fights, to whip Keith's brother in a previous match. This fight features Masvidal's freestyle technique and utter disregard for danger versus Wisniewski's appetite for vengeance.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Ron Bushfield takes us through his wrestling and coaching career, and gives us some insight into what his days look like. He loves to coach and always finds time to speak to his students individually. He's worked extensively with Hard Knocks fighter Noah Ali and today we'll follow him as he transfers his knowledge to the students on the mat.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Jason Bryant as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: See how a current fighter balances his own training and UFC aspirations with his life as a coach, trying to help others pursue their fight dreams. We follow Hard Knocks fighter Keegan Oliver through a day in his life as a Coach.

programme.title: Uri - The Surgical Strike
programme.desc: The film is a dramatized account of the retaliation by Indian Army to the 2016 URI attack. Major Vihaan Singh Shergill is a valiant army man who aces in strategic operations. However, when his mother's Alzheimer starts progressing rapidly, he bids goodbye to his border adventures and requests for a transfer to an army base in the Capital so that he can spend some time with her. During that period, Vihaan's brother-in-law Karan who is also his fellow army-man gets killed in the Uri attack. This incident triggers Vihaan to join the surgical strike operation and go all guns blazing to avenge the loss of his slayed fellow officers in the Uri attack.

programme.title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
programme.desc: Aarti Shukla, an intelligent girl, meets Satyendra Mishra, a clerk, for an arranged marriage. Aarti appreciates his non-traditional views, while he is captivated by her beauty. On the wedding night, Aarti learns she has cleared the PCS Exam and fearing her in-laws won't let her pursue her dreams, runs away with her sister and uncle's encouragement. Heartbroken, Satyendra is later assigned to handle a bribery case against Aarti.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S02 : E134 Mehek S2 E134
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: 1920 London
programme.desc: Shivangi lives in London with her husband Veer Singh. One day, he receives a gift from Rajasthan. From then, strange things happen with Veer and his condition deteriorates. Shivangi, thinking that this is because of black magic, goes to Rajasthan and finds Jai, an exorcist and begs him for help. Jai agrees to help Shivangi save her possessed husband from the evil spirit.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Jodha Akbar S3 E15
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Aligarh
programme.desc: Set in the state of Uttar Pradesh and based on true events, the plot revolves around Dr Shrinivas Ramchandra Siras who taught Marathi at Aligarh Muslim University. He was sacked from his position of Reader and Chair of Modern Indian Languages, on charges of homosexuality. A sting operation conducted by a TV channel showed him in a compromising position with a rickshaw puller inside the campus.
